page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT 03800597
page.content:
Most people of employable age work within or close to the area.The active male population works mainly in farming.There is a{small sawmill}which employs several men part_time,their income being supplemented by{forestry work.Several men and women are {employed by the army}on the Redesdale camp or nearby Otterburn camp.Some {young people}have moved away to find employment on other{farms}in the
county or have chosen to pursue{higher education.There is little employment for{school}leavers.Several{married {women}have part_time jobs,mainly outside the area,though the{cafe provides some{female}employment.There is a small group,mainly of incomers, who{commute}to jobs,some as far away as Newcastle.There is{virtually no } {unemployment within the area.
